title: [RESOLVED] Login Issues - 4/12/2014
body:
Hi all,

Just want to let you know - we are aware of an issue that is preventing players from logging in to League of Legends.  We're working on it and will update this thread with more info when it is available.

Best Regards
Mindstar

replies.body:
Thanks for your responses and feedback.  Please accept my apologies again for the bumpy ride last night.

As this particular issue is now solved, I'm going to close this thread.  If you are still experiencing login issues, I would suggest you contact the support team and/or look through some of the troubleshooting steps on the Riot [support site](https://support.riotgames.com/)

Best Regards,
Mindstar
Still not working. NSW
Thanks for the report, we're looking into what could be causing this now.
just an update. now I'm getting "unable to connect to pvp.net"
I was able to login however, the queue isn't working. And the store says "session expired" Chat kept on disconnecting as well :(
Login Error - Unable to connect :( {{summoner:11}} riot
Can you try again now?  We did some work on a piece of hardware that may have been causing the login problems.

@Riot

Its still the same. I attached a screenshot!
Can you try restarting your client and try logging in again?
Matching is taking forever! I think its broken
Its working now. Chat was disconnected and had to reconnect. Store seems to be operational as well :)
Thank you for the Info but dont you think you could tell us eariler? next time

Thanks for the feedback - we are certainly working to get better at timely responses to issues like this.  Often we are focused on co-ordinating problem solving, and it can take some time to get up to speed and ensure that our board posts are correct.

The server status page linked in the original post is a good resource to look at if you see a potential issue, as well as the client ticker, which often receives an update quite quickly.
Getting no response from server "The server did not respond to your request".

It's great and all to say that the issue is "resolved" but when it clearly isn't it becomes a little frustrating for the players, especially when we check server status and it says it's green (okay) but still continue to get the same issue of login failure, attempt x, disconnected etc etc
update: managed to log on now, still anxious about playing a game though if connectivity is fragile at the moment
Still not fixed, I cant log in at all either, says no response from server, has a couple of tries, says "logging in..." then tells me it cant connect.
same to me......my friend in SYD they r fine with that

Hi all

A quick update here.  The issue has been resolved, and it should be all good to play again.

The issue itself was a hardware failure, but we were able to identify what was broken and get it fixed.  We know what caused it, and will endeavour to make sure it doesn't happen again.

Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience.  

Best Regards
Mindstar
still not working can only get in using lol admin
Still not working homie...
I still get stuck at the "logging on" phase of connecting. {{item:3151}}

I'm able to log in now after a few attempts.
I'm goin in {{summoner:6}}
Not even remotely resolved
Nope got back in tried to spectate a mate the whole thing went crap again so i tried to re log same issue as before
Are we getting something out of this? Considering a lot of us were booted mid-game!

I think I have just managed to log in OK. 

Thought I'd come back and say thank mindstar for more timely communication than usual and an unusual (partial) admission that it was a riot hardware issue.

I know we can get a bit frustrated and abusive at times, me included.  Take it as a positive sign about how passionate we are about the game.
I can't seem to open my LoL launcher. Nothing happens when i double click it. I have tried to reinstall it twice and still nothing. Pls help i'm on a mac.

See my [response above](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/nexW3JsQ-resolved-login-issues-4122014?comment=00160000), in reply to Exogenic.  it seems like you might be having similar issues.

currently in sydney and when i click on my lol launcher the icon pops up in the middle of the screen then dissappears shortly after have tried restarting and reinstalling and nothing has seemed to work thus far. plz riot help me

Hi,

This sounds like a slightly different issue to the one that we were looking into in this thread, even if the result is the same for you (can't play).  From what you have described, it sounds like an issue with the patching system in your client.

My suggestion would be to go through the steps outlined under "TROUBLESHOOTING ISSUES WITH THE PATCHING PROCESS" [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues).  If you are still experiencing issues, get in touch with the support team (by submitting a ticket, using the support link on the top right of the site).

Cheers
Mindstar
Still seems to be an ongoing issue for many. Is there any further information regarding the problem and is there any action we need to take to help with troubleshooting this???
Same in Victoria. I don't expect a resolution tonight. It's bedtime for most people. Here's to tomorrow.

I can't open League of Legends, it keeps prompting "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information."  I tried to download it again and it wont even open to install the game. Sydney, NSW

> I can't open League of Legends, it keeps prompting "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information."  I tried to download it again and it wont even open to install the game. Sydney, NSW

this is literally exactly my case, this is a joke
this just started to happent o me about an hour ago. cang e to log in apge but wont connect when trying to log in

Not resolved for me yet sorry in Victoria. This was happening last night as well but I was able to login briefly this morning only for things to happen again. Have reinstalled etc. multiple times before seeing this thread.
Still not working in W.A
Meanwhile I still can't log in :L {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Still can't log in :(
Also parroting the problems in NSW =(. Itd be good if Riot had a bug hunter equivalent for this so people could send in tracerts to assist with diagnosis if its a routing/network issue.
I was able to login, but I can't connect to the chat service.
Not resolved sozza
I am also unable to log on. It is just stuck on logging on, then it times out and quits the client.
This issue has not been fixed on my end nor my friends both of us are located in SA. We get stuck at "logging in..."
still cant log in~~~ WHY my friend can log in........
thanks for tell us about that ;D
thank you :)
